'''Paimon's Paintings Set Kiehl's''' is a [[Paimon's Paintings]] Emoji set including [[Tighnari]], [[Collei]], [[Arakanta]], [[Arabalika]], [[Araphala]], [[Arama]], and [[Aramani]]. This set is part of the collaboration event [[Genshin Impact × Kiehl's]].
